Package client

Interface View

All Known Implementing Classes:
CliView, GuiView
public interface View
Manages the interface to the user

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void askAction​(RoundActions roundActions, MapInfo mapInfo, java.lang.String loserNickname)
    Asks the action the player wants to perform
    void askFirstPlayer​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> playersNicknames)
    Asks the nickname of the first player
    void askGameCards​(int numCards)
    Asks the game cards
    void askNewNickname()
    Asks a new nickname to the user and notify the choice to the serverHandler
    void askPlayerCard​(java.util.List<Card> possibleChoices)
    Asks the card the player whats to use during the game
    void askPlayerColor​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> availableColors)
    Asks the color the player whats to choose
    void askPlayerPosition​(Genre genre, java.util.List<Cell> forbiddenCells, MapInfo mapInfo)
    Asks the first position for the male and female worker
    void launch()
    Interface launcher.
    void setServerHandler​(ServerHandler serverHandler)
    Sets the serverHandler
    void setUpGame​(boolean newGame)
    Asks nickname, birth date and if it's a new game the number of players for the game and notify the information to the serverHandler
    void showCardAssignmentMessage​(java.util.List<Player> playerList)
    Shows the cards assignment of the game
    void showDisconnectionMessage​(java.lang.String disconnectedNickname)
    Notify the players that a player has disconnected and the game has ended
    void showErrorMessage​(java.lang.String errorMessage, boolean newScreen)
    Shows an error message to the user
    void showGameCards​(java.util.List<Card> cards)
    Show all the cards of the game
    void showGameEndMessage​(java.lang.String winnerNickname, boolean youWin)
    Notify the players that the game has ended and notify the winner
    void showLoser​(java.lang.String loserNickname)
    Notify the players that there is a loser
    void showMap​(MapInfo mapInfo, boolean newScreen)
    Shows the board of the game
    void showMessage​(java.lang.String message, boolean newScreen)
    Shows a specified message to the user
    void showQueuedMessage()
    Shows a message to say to the user that is connected to the server and will be added to the next available game
    void showTurn​(java.lang.String currentNickname, boolean hasLoser)
    Shows the user who is taking his turn

  • Method Details

    • setServerHandler

      void setServerHandler​(ServerHandler serverHandler)
      Sets the serverHandler
      Parameters:
      serverHandler - The serverHandler

    • launch

      void launch()
      Interface launcher. Asks the server IP to connect to and notify it to the serverHandler

    • showQueuedMessage

      void showQueuedMessage()
      Shows a message to say to the user that is connected to the server and will be added to the next available game

    • showMessage

      void showMessage​(java.lang.String message, boolean newScreen)
      Shows a specified message to the user
      Parameters:
      message - The message to be shown
      newScreen - True if it's necessary to clean the interface

    • askNewNickname

      void askNewNickname()
      Asks a new nickname to the user and notify the choice to the serverHandler

    • setUpGame

      void setUpGame​(boolean newGame)
      Asks nickname, birth date and if it's a new game the number of players for the game and notify the information to the serverHandler
      Parameters:
      newGame - True if the it is a new game, otherwise false

    • askGameCards

      void askGameCards​(int numCards)
      Asks the game cards
      Parameters:
      numCards - Number of cards to be selected

    • askPlayerCard

      void askPlayerCard​(java.util.List<Card> possibleChoices)
      Asks the card the player whats to use during the game
      Parameters:
      possibleChoices - All the possible cards

    • askFirstPlayer

      void askFirstPlayer​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> playersNicknames)
      Asks the nickname of the first player
      Parameters:
      playersNicknames - All the nicknames

    • showGameCards

      void showGameCards​(java.util.List<Card> cards)
      Show all the cards of the game
      Parameters:
      cards - All the cards of the game

    • showCardAssignmentMessage

      void showCardAssignmentMessage​(java.util.List<Player> playerList)
      Shows the cards assignment of the game
      Parameters:
      playerList - The list of players of the game

    • askPlayerColor

      void askPlayerColor​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> availableColors)
      Asks the color the player whats to choose
      Parameters:
      availableColors - All the available colors

    • askPlayerPosition

      void askPlayerPosition​(Genre genre, java.util.List<Cell> forbiddenCells, MapInfo mapInfo)
      Asks the first position for the male and female worker
      Parameters:
      genre - The genre of the worker
      forbiddenCells - The forbidden cells
      mapInfo - The map info

    • showMap

      void showMap​(MapInfo mapInfo, boolean newScreen)
      Shows the board of the game
      Parameters:
      mapInfo - The map info
      newScreen - True if it's necessary to clean the interface

    • askAction

      void askAction​(RoundActions roundActions, MapInfo mapInfo, java.lang.String loserNickname)
      Asks the action the player wants to perform
      Parameters:
      roundActions - All the possible actions
      mapInfo - The map info
      loserNickname - The nickname of the looser or null value

    • showGameEndMessage

      void showGameEndMessage​(java.lang.String winnerNickname, boolean youWin)
      Notify the players that the game has ended and notify the winner
      Parameters:
      winnerNickname - The nickname of the winner
      youWin - True if the player has win

    • showDisconnectionMessage

      void showDisconnectionMessage​(java.lang.String disconnectedNickname)
      Notify the players that a player has disconnected and the game has ended
      Parameters:
      disconnectedNickname - The nickname of the disconnected player

    • showErrorMessage

      void showErrorMessage​(java.lang.String errorMessage, boolean newScreen)
      Shows an error message to the user
      Parameters:
      errorMessage - The message to be shown
      newScreen - True if it's necessary to clean the interface

    • showLoser

      void showLoser​(java.lang.String loserNickname)
      Notify the players that there is a loser
      Parameters:
      loserNickname - The nickname of the loser

    • showTurn

      void showTurn​(java.lang.String currentNickname, boolean hasLoser)
      Shows the user who is taking his turn
      Parameters:
      currentNickname - The nickname of the user who is taking his turn
      hasLoser - True if during the turn a player has lost
